Major_Arcs.title: King Guz's Mis-Rescue and Debt
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on King Guz's unusual rescue from drowning and the subsequent revelation of a clam debt, highlighting the rescuer's ulterior motives.

sub_scenes.title: The Unconventional Rescue and Debt
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts King Guz's 'rescue' from drowning and the immediate aftermath where the rescuer confronts him about an unpaid debt, revealing a transactional aspect to the rescue.

narrative_arcs.title: The Debt of Clams and the 'Rescue'

Major_Arcs.title: Bronto's Clumsiness
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around Bronto the dinosaur's clumsiness, his tendency to bump into trees, and Alley Oop's frustration with his dinosaur's age and mileage.

sub_scenes.title: Bronto's Tree Trouble and Age
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene illustrates Bronto bumping into a tree, Alley's encounter with a tree-dwelling dinosaur, and a conversation where Bronto's clumsiness is attributed to old age and high mileage.

narrative_arcs.title: Bronto's Bumpy Ride and the Tree Dweller

Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Trade-in and Purchase
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc narrates the process of trading in an old dinosaur for a new one, from initial consideration to purchase and the emotional farewell to the old dinosaur.

sub_scenes.title: Considering a New Dinosaur
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the initial idea of trading in a dinosaur, the visit to Honest Zog's dealership, and the selection and test drive of a smaller dinosaur model.

narrative_arcs.title: The Little Baby with Zip and Power

sub_scenes.title: Test Drive and Purchase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the test drive experience, including initial positive impressions, an unexpected biting incident, and the eventual purchase of the new dinosaur despite the biting.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Impression of the New Dinosaur

sub_scenes.title: Farewell and Regret
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the emotional farewell to the old dinosaur, the initial experience with the new dinosaur and its rules, and the caveman's subsequent regret over trading in his old companion.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Mis-Sale and Return
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around the accidental resale of the old dinosaur, Dinny, and the caveman's unexpected repurchase and joyful reunion with his old friend.

sub_scenes.title: The Cheap Dinosaur Purchase and Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the purchase of a cheap dinosaur, the unexpected wild ride, and the shocking revelation that the 'new' dinosaur is actually the old one, Dinny.

narrative_arcs.title: Closing the Deal with a Sales Pitch
Voice from the Past: Dinny's Roar

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Re-Rescue and Reassurance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays Dinny's mistreatment by a new owner, his defense by another caveman, and the original owner's reaffirmation of their bond and promise of never parting again.

Major_Arcs.title: Relationship Troubles and Fishing Complaints
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the breakup of Alley and Coola, followed by a series of humorous and somewhat misogynistic complaints related to fishing and women.

sub_scenes.title: Alley and Coola's Breakup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Alley's invitation to Coola to go fishing, her rejection, and the ensuing argument that leads to their breakup.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Frustrations
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents a series of panels expressing humorous frustrations related to fishing, including misogynistic remarks about women and complaints about noise disrupting fishing.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Apology by the River

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Rivalry and Misunderstanding
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details a romantic rivalry between cavemen for Oola, culminating in a jealous outburst, a physical fight, and a comical misunderstanding about cannibalism.

sub_scenes.title: Jealousy and Confirmation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces rumors of romantic competition for Oola, the initial disbelief, and the eventual confirmation of the rivalry, leading to dismay.

sub_scenes.title: Misdirected Violence and Clarification
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a violent outburst of jealousy, the woman's misdirected anger, and the eventual clarification that leads to the rejected suitor realizing his error.

narrative_arcs.title: Realization of Error and Rejected Suitor

Major_Arcs.title: Learning Romance and Crocodile Comedy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the rejected caveman seeking advice on romance, attempting to implement a romantic strategy, and experiencing a humorous crocodile-related mishap while observing his rival.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Romantic Advice
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the rejected caveman seeking advice on romance, receiving a strategy to imitate his rival, and the advisor's humorous reflection on communication.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Advice on Romance and Rivalry

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Gifts and Crocodile Mishap
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Koko's romantic gestures, another caveman's branch offering, and the humorous incident where a crocodile gets stuck in a hut doorway, orchestrated by Koko.

narrative_arcs.title: The Branch Offering and Impending Danger

Major_Arcs.title: Jealousy and Cannibalism Misunderstanding
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the jealous caveman's eavesdropping, his aggressive confrontation of Koko and Oola, and the comical misunderstanding where Koko accuses him of cannibalism.

sub_scenes.title: Jealousy and Cannibalism Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the jealous caveman's rage, his eavesdropping on Koko and Oola, his aggressive confrontation, and Koko's mistaken accusation of cannibalism, resolved by Oola.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Misadventures and Reflections
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores various romantic scenarios, from infidelity and its consequences to attempts at romantic reformation and philosophical reflections on women.

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity and Romantic Reformation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents scenes of infidelity being punished, a plea for forgiveness and romantic rebrand, and a polite hand-kissing request, showcasing different facets of romance.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusations of Infidelity and Physical Retribution
Plea for Forgiveness and Romantic Rebrand

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Philosophies on Women
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the page with a humorous reflection on women while fishing, echoing earlier misogynistic themes in a lighthearted way.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twist Dance Fad
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the introduction of the 'NEW TWIST' dance, initial resistance and injuries, social pressure to learn it, and a disastrous first dance lesson.

sub_scenes.title: The Twist Dance Resistance and Demand
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the 'NEW TWIST' dance, shows its dangerous nature and initial resistance to learning it, followed by the rising social pressure to participate.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dangerous New Twist Dance and Initial Resistance
Social Pressure and Demands to Learn the New Twist

sub_scenes.title: The Twist Dance Lesson Disaster
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays a disastrous first dance lesson for 'The Twitch' at Arthur Mugwump Dance Studios, ending with a humorous name reveal of the dance teacher.

narrative_arcs.title: A Disastrous First Dance Lesson and Name Reveal

Major_Arcs.title: The Negative Aftermath of The Twist
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc illustrates the chaotic and harmful consequences of 'The Twitch' dance, ranging from social humiliation to widespread hospitalizations.

sub_scenes.title: The Negative Aftermath of The Twist
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reflects on the ultimately valueless nature of 'The Twitch' and depicts the escalating negative consequences, leading to fear, humiliation, and mass hospitalization due to the dance.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflecting on 'The Twitch' and its Unforeseen Consequences

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel Mishaps
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts a series of time travel mishaps, starting with a plan to visit 16th-century Spain and ending with an unexpected trip to the future and a return to a strange castle in Spain.

sub_scenes.title: Planning Time Travel to Spain
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the planning of time travel to 16th-century Spain to gather historical information, and the initial steps of activating the time machine.

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel Interruption and Future Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays a romantic moment interrupted by time machine activation, leading to an unexpected arrival in the 20th century future.

narrative_arcs.title: Reluctant Kiss and Time Machine Activation
Unexpected Time Travel to the Future

sub_scenes.title: Brief Future Visit and Return to Spain
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves a brief stay in the 20th century lab, dialogue about the time travel mishap, and the activation of the time machine to return to Spain, though to a different location than intended.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in the Twentieth Century and Return to Spain

Major_Arcs.title: Spanish Misadventure and Bullfight
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details a misadventure in Spain, starting with arrival at a strange castle, a serenade misunderstanding leading to a fight, and an unplanned bullfight performance.

sub_scenes.title: Serenade Misunderstanding and Fight
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts arrival at a strange castle, the sound of a serenade, a misunderstanding leading to an attack on the serenading musician.

sub_scenes.title: Escalation and Matador Reveal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the fight escalating, the woman revealing the musician is her boyfriend and a famous matador, leading to the arrival of the manager.

sub_scenes.title: Novelty Bullfight Plan and Setup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the manager's assessment of the situation and his plan to create a novelty bullfight act using the man who caused the disruption.

sub_scenes.title: Unconventional Bullfight and Victory
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the pre-fight banter, the unconventional bullfight using a club, and the surprising victory of the man in loincloth.

Major_Arcs.title: Oop's Unsuccessful Return
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Oop's return from Spain, his initial praise, a sudden 'zap', romantic complications with jealous accusations, and ultimately, rejection of a promised kiss.

sub_scenes.title: Oop's Return and Initial Praise
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts anticipation for Oop's return, his praised arrival, a sudden 'zap' event, and the promise of a kiss.

narrative_arcs.title: Anticipation for Oop's Return and Information
The Promised Kiss and Romantic Interlude

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Accusations and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays a jealous accusation of infidelity towards Oop, and his subsequent statement about not getting a kiss, indicating romantic failure.

narrative_arcs.title: Questioning Oop's Learnings and Rejection of Kiss

Major_Arcs.title: The Perils of Temporary Kingship
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously explores the concept of temporary kingship, showing the initial celebratory inauguration, the challenge to its ease, and the disastrous experience of the temporary king.

sub_scenes.title: Setting up the Temporary Kingship
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the inauguration of a temporary king, a confrontation challenging the ease of kingship, a debate, a challenge, and the crowning of a new temporary king.

narrative_arcs.title: The Inauguration of a Temporary King
Debate on the Ease of Kingship
King's Challenge and Temporary Replacement Plan
The Crowning of the New Temporary King

sub_scenes.title: The Temporary King's Unpleasant Reign and Return of Original King
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the proclamation of the temporary king, the crowd's violent rejection, the temporary king seeking refuge and realizing the hardships, and the comfortable return of the original king.

narrative_arcs.title: Proclamation of a Temporary King and His Expectations
Rejection and Attack on the Temporary King
Seeking Refuge and Realization of Hardships
Return of the Original King and Enjoyment of Power

Major_Arcs.title: Guz's Domestic Troubles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a domestic dispute between Guz and a woman (Oompa), characterized by disapproval, physical confrontation, and forced compliance.

sub_scenes.title: Guz's Relaxation and Oompa's Displeasure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Guz relaxing and eating, interrupted by a woman's abrupt disapproval, escalating to physical confrontation and forced compliance with her demands.

Major_Arcs.title: The Clam Dispute Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc deals with a dispute over found clams, escalating to a fight, and being resolved by a 'wise man' through confiscation.

sub_scenes.title: Resolving the Clam Dispute with Wisdom
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays an outbreak of accusations and fighting, the explanation of the dispute over clams, and the 'wise man's' intervention and solution through confiscation.

narrative_arcs.title: Explanation of the Clam Dispute and Seeking Wisdom
The Wise Man's Solution: Confiscation and Peace

Major_Arcs.title: The Unpredictable King
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc illustrates the unpredictable behavior of a king, from ignoring violence to sudden shifts in mood and violent reactions to minor playful gestures.

sub_scenes.title: Royal Inquiries and Complaints
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the king ignoring violence outside, accusations against the 'wise man', and the king's initial praise followed by sudden complaint about dinner and the server.

narrative_arcs.title: Investigating the Racket and Ongoing Beating

sub_scenes.title: The King's Volatile Reactions
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays the king's bizarre ulcer inquiry, the server's regret contrasting with the king's gluttony, and the king's sudden violent reaction to a playful gesture from the server.

narrative_arcs.title: The Ulcer Inquiry and Bizarre Demand

Major_Arcs.title: Leadership Transition and New Ruler Search
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc describes a leadership transition, starting with an apology for misunderstanding, a caveman's relief at relinquishing power, and the search for a new ruler.

sub_scenes.title: Apologies and Leadership Vacuum
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows an apology for misunderstanding and violence, a deeper apology expressing job disdain, and a caveman's relief at being free from rule, creating a leadership vacuum.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking and Preparing for a New Ruler
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the offer of kingship to a blonde man and the subsequent preparations for the new ruler, including measuring a board and mentioning a 'strange duck'.

narrative_arcs.title: Measuring for Rule and Strange Duck

Major_Arcs.title: The Barber's Forceful Methods
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc reveals the bizarre and forceful methods of a barber, who abducts customers after a misleading fortune telling.

sub_scenes.title: Misleading Fortune and Abduction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up a fortune telling scenario, where a romantic prophecy is made, followed by the bearded man fulfilling the 'prophecy' and then violently abducting another man.

sub_scenes.title: The Barber Shop Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals the bearded man is a barber and the abduction was to force customers into his 'MOO TONSORIAL PARLOR', providing a humorous explanation for the violence.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel Gone Wrong
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a time travel experiment gone awry, resulting in the unexpected arrival of a Roman centurion and the realization of a time machine malfunction.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Experiment and Unexpected Outcome
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the setup of a time machine experiment, the materialization process, the surprising arrival of a Roman centurion, and the inventor's realization of a malfunction.
